Name: Nyanco Desktop Mascot
About the game: Welcome to the Nyanco Desktop Mascot app. In this application, you can set and control your favorite 2D character on your PC’s desktop! Features : Simple and easy to use Mascots capable of physics elements Customizable or replaceable desktop mascot Recommended for 2D anime character fans or streamers. Special Thanks : Alice, nashix, ParanoX, Holy Lightning, 腌笃鲜, ＵＮＫ教祖, and the player! How to set or change the mascot you want : Prepare 4 images for your mascot character with a transparent background (PNG format) Change the file name of each image as follows : air, idle, left, right Put them into the images folder Close the app and restart it Note : The mascot's image size must be smaller than your desktop screen's resolution size. How to find the images folder of this app : Steam Client -> Right-Click The App -> Properties -> Local Files -> Browse How to close the app : Click the mascot and press the “ALT + F4” keys at the same time You can also close the app by pressing the 'STOP' button located on your Steam client. Is this app currently in Early Access? No, this is already the full version of the app. However, there will be updates as needed. Contact us (Nyanco Channel), if you would like to participate in the development or improvement of this app. Also, if you'd like to collaborate with us and include your character as DLC for our app, please feel free to reach out to us!
